name: Ultimate Tag
description:
The Thrill of the Chase

Chase your friends through unique maps, trying to tag each other and avoid being "it" at all costs!

Level Up

At the end of each round, the losers choose powers that will aid them in the future. Losing isn't so bad after all...

Customize

Unlock a wide range of new colors and accessories, and dress to impress!

Easy to Pick Up

With only five buttons per player, anyone can pick up a controller and join in the fun!
